plot: A corrupt french police detective, with a serious drug, gambling and violence addiction, tries to change his ways and find forgiveness after a botched deal leaves him with a large debt to a ruthless drug lord.
plot_en: A corrupt french police detective, with a serious drug, gambling and violence addiction, tries to change his ways and find forgiveness after a botched deal leaves him with a large debt to a ruthless drug lord.
plot_es: A corrupt french police detective, with a serious drug, gambling and violence addiction, tries to change his ways and find forgiveness after a botched deal leaves him with a large debt to a ruthless drug lord.
title: Marc Saint Georges: The Savior
